name: Testo SE & Co. KGaA
bossPosition: Business Unit Manager - Thermal Imaging, Emission, Particle
goal: Testo SE & Co. KGaA has developed into the world market leader in the field of portable measuring technology with its roots in Black Forest engineering. Around 2500 employees develop, produce and market a large number of Testo measuring instruments worldwide. Highly qualified and motivated employees and above-average investment in the high-tech company’s future-oriented development are the basis of this success. Around 10 percent of the annual Group turnover worldwide is reinvested in research & development.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
Non-Road Mobile Machinery Revision of Directive 97/68/EC.

Real Driving Emission – RDE method as complement to the applicable test cycle for type approval under Euro 6c.

The Regulation EU No 64/2012, amending Regulation (EU) No 582/2011, implementing and amending Regulation (EC) No 595/2009, which describes the new emission Limits for HDV.

Regulation No 459/2012 which mentiones the examination of a Euro 6 OBD threshold value for the particle number at a later date than 2014.
